definition: queen/empress/imperial concubine/Goddess, esp. Xi Wangmu 王母娘娘 or 西王母, Queen Mother of the West/mother/aunt
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West

sentences.english: The granddaughter of the Goddess of Heaven visited the earth.
sentences.chinese: 王母娘娘的外孙女下凡到人间。

sentences.english: Backstage at the "girlie" show at the state fair.
sentences.chinese: 在后台的“娘娘腔”，在公平的状态显示。

sentences.english: Tons of Americans are cake boys. So yeah they could beat these cissies.
sentences.chinese: 许多美国人是奶油小生，所以他们能打败这些娘娘腔。

sentences.english: Still have them to appear to call their their own empresses?
sentences.chinese: 还有他们好像叫自己娘娘？

sentences.english: Temple, which is within the Poseidon empress sea fishermen sacrifice the gods places.
sentences.chinese: 庙内供奉海神娘娘，是出海渔民祭祀神明的场所。

sentences.english: Girls get fed up with the feminine nature of the men.
sentences.chinese: 女孩儿们更是受够了那些阴柔的娘娘腔。

sentences.english: It's pity that he paid no attention to her advice.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾的是后羿没有听从王母娘娘的建议。

sentences.english: But Ning frost feel empress really not should so.
sentences.chinese: 可是凝霜觉得娘娘真不该这样。

sentences.english: When you're around a woman you like, don't act like a GIRLY-MAN.
sentences.chinese: 当你围绕着你心爱的女人时，不要表现得像个娘娘腔。

sentences.english: I don't really think you're a sissy . You're a little girly .
sentences.chinese: 我不觉得你是个娘娘腔，你就是有点女性化。

sentences.english: I think he’s an awful sissy .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他这个人太娘娘腔了。

sentences.english: This boy is kind of a sissy, so other kids make fun of him.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩有点娘娘腔，所以别的孩子会嘲笑他。

sentences.english: Fang is a dance instructor who appears sissy. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 方先生是一个舞蹈教练谁似乎娘娘腔。

sentences.english: The Goddess is said to own some magical peach trees in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 传说王母娘娘在天上有一些神奇的桃树。

sentences.english: And the object of promotion basically is the male when, most avoid sentimental is sissy.
sentences.chinese: 而推广的对象主要是男性时，又最忌婆婆妈妈娘娘腔。

sentences.english: Concerning almost thus the his majesty and empress is really the error of Yan Qing.
sentences.chinese: 令陛下和娘娘如此挂念，真是颜卿的过失。

definition: (literary) I, your servant (self-appellation of a lower-rank female)/(archaic) male and female slaves/subjects (of a ruler)
founder or leader of a religion or sect/(fig.) revered figure
the emperor/Your majesty the emperor/His imperial majesty
I, me (self-referring by a widowed empress etc, used in historical novels and operas)
